comments: *** Bug 50484 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Please could you try the latest? We've made changes that will probably fix the 
problem, but I cannot confirm that since I was unable to reproduce the problem.

You need to get a nightly build greater than 20030123 or use HEAD from CVS.

You're right. When I take the last swt plugin coming from nightly build
(i20040121) and put it in my 3.0M6 version, it works! So I can import jfreechart
.jar and have my charts working in eclipse workbench :) Keep it like that please!
Thanks all!!!

Mathieu
